body:
I remove extra spaces (again).

I followed your instructions and I have this problem :

    ERROR: Permission to rails/rails.git denied to GCorbel.
    fatal: The remote end hung up unexpectedly

This is my .git/config :

    [core]
	repositoryformatversion = 0
	filemode = true
	bare = false
	logallrefupdates = true
    [remote "origin"]
	fetch = +refs/heads/*:refs/remotes/origin/*
	url = git@github.com:rails/rails.git
    [branch "master"]
	remote = origin
	merge = refs/heads/master
    [remote "mine"]
	url = git@github.com:GCorbel/rails.git
	fetch = +refs/heads/*:refs/remotes/mine/*
    [remote "rails"]
	url = git@github.com:rails/rails.git
	fetch = +refs/heads/*:refs/remotes/rails/*

Thanks for your help. Maybe one day I will have the right for rails... I have them in my dreams...
